subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just wondering,
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0008_01C9D48C.FF1EFA60
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I am not sure how to take this. I don't think you were being singled out. D=
o you assume that just because it is a graveyard that makes it haunted?

  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: James W. Hyslope 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, May 14, 2009 12:04 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re=
: Just wondering,





  I for one am new at this...but doesn't mean I take=
 this field very lightly. I have recorded once (so far) in a Cemetery...and=
 I took the whole idea "seriously", and with RESPECT. I can say for a FACT-=
-that the voices I receive are "genuine" and not audible before playback...=
that to me is more desirable (and credible) than some that take "bits and p=
ieces" of a radio program to try and place the information into a "question=
" or "answer" then try and sell (my unique) way of reaching the unseen. And=
 for the 2 weeks that I have been doing this...I seem to have gotten some a=
mazing results with my "recorder" type technique. I am getting playful spir=
its, sadness, needy voices, anger, laughter, my first name spoken, possibly=
 contacted my mother twice (unless is a trickster spirit)...so to say "some=
one" does this in a form (that others don't approve)?? None of us are exper=
ts yet...so we will look for ANYTHING to try and find the correct "angle" t=
hat works for us :) Even if it includes an old Cemetery or working off the =
"Broadcast Band Radio Waves" to shack up some type of sentence. I don't kno=
w...who has more "throw away" audio?? I know ALL of my EVP is "unique".....=
I for one have tried the "radio" type of EVP. I tried 2 Shack Mods...no joy=
 here people. For me "I saw it at face value" after just a few minutes. I d=
on't mean to offend. But I didn't step "first". Now who can say (for certai=
n) WHO has the better form? What ever gets us closer to ourselves, and our =
lost FRIEND'S. That's ALL that matters man :) PS...I am a 46 year old male =
from Iowa. I have died and went to the tunnel (when I was 18)...was told "n=
ot my time to go" by a male voice that echoed (in the darkness). I have see=
n 3 UFO's in V formation (during Heavens Gate) *2nd comet of that year (her=
e in Iowa) I have seen 1 "shadow" person (take 1 step and vanish) touched a=
 ghost (snuck up on it)...got a burn on tip of my finger where I reached ou=
t to touch top of it's head (entity was small like child). I have developed=
 1 xray plate with my finger tips to make multiple white spots in the film-=
over 20 spots (naval medical officer was angry when he saw them) hahaha...h=
e didn't know I did it when his back was turned :) Lot's of fun out here Gu=
y's (and GALS) let's try and not point fingers now.....Knowbody should feel=
 like they are singled out here...like I said "none of us "here" have ALL t=
he answers". So I'm not a total "Newbie"...but I will try a grace yard agai=
n someday. And I would hope that people will respect me as well as I...of t=
hose IN that Grave Yard. --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April Abercrombie=
" <april@...> wrote:
  >
  > Maybe some ghost hunters assume this, but not =
us ghost hunters who take our field very seriously.
  > 
  > ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
  > From: Frank Sumption 
  > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
=
  > Sent: Wednesday, May 13, 2009 7:15 PM
  > Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Just w=
ondering,
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > It's just an assumtption on mos=
t "ghost hunters" part that the dead would be where they died, or were burr=
ied, a Hollywoodism I think. I record in my basement. 
  > 
  > F-S
  > 
  =
> 
  > On Wed, May 13, 2009 at 7:07 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:
  > 
  > 
  =
> 
  > 
  > 
  > I have a question, why is it that people are always going =
to grave yards, why would any spirit or ghost want to hang around in a plac=
e of so much sadness, when they've got the whole universe to explore. Why d=
on't they go to some fun places?
  > 
  > In a message dated 5/13/2009 8:05=
:16 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com writes:
  > 
  > 
 =
 > 
  > 
  > Hello,
  > 
  > This email message is a notification to let yo=
u know that
  > a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
=
  > group.
  > 
  > File : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/Something-Baby_evp.wav 
  >=
 Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  > Description : From a local =
grave yard. All I can understand is the word "baby" that is said 3 times. 
=
  > 
  > You can access this file at the URL:
  > http://groups.yahoo.com/g=
roup/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/Something-Baby_evp.wav 
  > =

  > To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
  > htt=
p://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles
 =
 > 
  > Regards,
  > 
  > clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
  >
